<center>

I grew up in western Massachusetts playing sports and being outdoors. I graduated high school and went to Union College in upstate New York. Following my undergraduate degree, I went to the University of New Hampshire where I am currently studying biochemistry. 

## Sports
* Soccer
* Skiing
* Crew

## Hobbies

I love to be outdoors whenever I get the chance. I am an avid runner and skier. I also enjoy drinking coffee and spending time with dogs.
